column4: i keep getting search for a suitable plugin when playing videos in firefox using the mozilla-plugin-vlc on ubuntu, when i cancel the dialog the video plays. Any ideas how to fix / stop the dialog from comming up ?
maybe you have conflicting plugins? try removing the totem mozilla plugin
if i go onto plugins in firefox i have a dropbox where i can select either VLC totem compatable or VLC , if i use just vlc, the player just shows "waiting for video"
vlc perhaps doesn't support the codec used? i don't know
